name: 格斗少女
description:
At present, it is still a semi-finished product. It is interested in the EA stage (it has been officially released by mistake), and does not like the impressive prospect of semi-finished products.

A brief introduction

This is a fighting game that is easy to decompress.
You can play alone or with friends on the same screen.
On the basis of fighting, the explosion-proof gameplay is integrated.

Gameplay

  • Simple fighting game, defeat your opponent within a limited time to win.
  • There are currently four characters to choose from.
  • Clothing has a chance to block damage, and will shatter when the number of blocks is reached.
Note: The initial characters are secondary processing of male models, and original characters will be added for free in the future. If you don't like it, you can wait.
